title: Authorizes counties and towns to restrict speed limits to less than 55 MPH; repealer
summary: Authorizes counties and towns to restrict speed limits to less than 55 MPH on county roads and town highways outside cities and villages; restricts maximum limits to not lower than twenty-five MPH, except on roads adjacent to schools, which may be lowered to 15 MPH.

       Introduced  by M. of A. CALHOUN -- read once and referred to the Commit-

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to  the  estab-
         lishment  of speed limits on county roads and town highways in certain
         cases and to repeal section 1622 of such law relating thereto

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 1622 of the vehicle and traffic law is REPEALED.
    2    S  2.  The  vehicle and traffic law is amended by adding a new section
    3  1651-a  to read as follows:
    4    S 1651-A.  SPEED LIMITS ON COUNTY ROADS IN CERTAIN CASES.  THE  COUNTY
    5  LEGISLATURE  UPON  THE  REQUEST OF   THE TOWN BOARD OF THE TOWN OR TOWNS
    6  AFFECTED WITH RESPECT TO COUNTY ROADS IN SUCH TOWN OR TOWNS  OUTSIDE  OF
    7  CITIES OR VILLAGES, MAY BY LOCAL LAW:
    8    1.  ESTABLISH MAXIMUM SPEED LIMITS AT WHICH VEHICLES MAY PROCEED ON OR
    9  ALONG  SUCH  HIGHWAYS LOWER THAN THE FIFTY-FIVE MILES PER HOUR STATUTORY
   10  MAXIMUM SPEED LIMIT.  NO SUCH LIMIT SHALL BE ESTABLISHED  AT  LESS  THAN
   11  TWENTY-FIVE  MILES  PER  HOUR,  EXCEPT  THAT  SCHOOL SPEED LIMITS MAY BE
   12  ESTABLISHED AT NOT LESS THAN FIFTEEN MILES PER HOUR ON ANY PORTION OF  A
   13  HIGHWAY  PASSING  A SCHOOL BUILDING FOR NOT MORE THAN THREE HUNDRED FEET
   14  IN EITHER DIRECTION FROM THE BUILDING LINE OF A SCHOOL ABUTTING  ON  THE
   15  HIGHWAY.
   16    2.  ESTABLISH MAXIMUM SPEED LIMITS AT WHICH VEHICLES MAY PROCEED ON OR
   17  ALONG ALL SUCH HIGHWAYS LYING WITHIN AN AREA OR AREAS AS DESIGNATED BY A
   18  DESCRIPTION  OF  THE  BOUNDARIES  OF SUCH AREA OR AREAS SUBMITTED BY THE
   19  TOWN BOARD OF THE TOWN OR TOWNS AFFECTED LOWER THAN FIFTY-FIVE MILES PER
   20  HOUR STATUTORY MAXIMUM SPEED LIMIT.  NO SUCH LIMIT SHALL BE  ESTABLISHED
   21  AT LESS THAN THIRTY MILES PER HOUR.
   22    S  3.  The  vehicle and traffic law is amended by adding a new section
   23  1660-b to read as follows:

   26  excess of such maximum school speed limits during:

   49  lished with respect to any restricted highway as authorized  in  section
   50  sixteen  hundred  twenty-five  OF THIS CHAPTER, no person shall drive in
